headline: Altria Could Shatter Its 52-Week High: This Dividend King Beckons With a 6.4% Yield
summary: Dividend Kings are companies that have increased their dividends for at least 50 years in a row. This is a rare feat that shows strong financial health and a real commitment to shareholders. Investing in stocks that pay dividends gives you a steady income that can grow over time through compounding. It also helps protect ...
